msg: LUCENE-3969: stop iterating random text if a thread hits a failure

author: mikemccand
msg: disable test until we can fix syn filter to consume graphs

author: stsp
msg: Fix a pool lifetime bug in the diff code. It caused a crash observed during
manual testing of 'svn diff --old X --new Y' with large directory trees.
(mark_path_as_visited): New helper function that adds a path to the diff
command baton's visited_paths hash. We must copy the key and value into
the hash table's pool because lifetime of memory they were allocated from
is under the caller's control and might be temporary.
(diff_props_changed, diff_content_changed): Use the new helper to mark

author: lu4242
